description: estimates the resources required by the l1_handler transaction induced by the message

data.description: More data about the execution failure

revert_error.description: a string encoding the execution trace up to the point of failure
revert_error.title: revert error

name: starknet_estimateMessageFee

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

entry_point_selector.description: The selector of the l1_handler in invoke in the target contract
entry_point_selector.title: Selector

ETH_ADDRESS.description: an ethereum address represented as 40 hex digits
ETH_ADDRESS.title: Ethereum address

from_address.description: The address of the L1 contract sending the message

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

to_address.description: The target L2 address the message is sent to
to_address.title: To address

params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag, for the block referencing the state or call the transaction on.
params.name: block_id

FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
FELT.title: Field element

BLOCK_TAG.description: A tag specifying a dynamic reference to a block
BLOCK_TAG.title: Block tag

NUM_AS_HEX.description: An integer number in hex format (0x...)
NUM_AS_HEX.title: Number as hex

gas_consumed.description: The Ethereum gas cost of the transaction (see https://docs.starknet.io/docs/Fees/fee-mechanism for more info)
gas_consumed.title: Gas consumed

NUM_AS_HEX.description: An integer number in hex format (0x...)
NUM_AS_HEX.title: Number as hex

gas_price.description: The gas price (in gwei) that was used in the cost estimation
gas_price.title: Gas price

NUM_AS_HEX.description: An integer number in hex format (0x...)
NUM_AS_HEX.title: Number as hex

overall_fee.description: The estimated fee for the transaction (in gwei), product of gas_consumed and gas_price
overall_fee.title: Overall fee

summary: estimate the L2 fee of a message sent on L1
